specifications: 7 inch brand new grade A TFT LCD Panel Resolution: 480 x 234 (16:9) Support SD, MMC, MS (3 in 1 slot) memory card USB2.0 host port Support file format: JPEG Audio: MP3, WMA Video: MPEG 1,2,4,AVI Slideshow multiple transition mode and adjustable intervals time Slideshow photo with background music function With Time, alarm, auto turn on/off and calendar functions Built-in 2x1W speaker OSD languages: English, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Spanish, etc Key press operation and remote control Power adapter: DC 9V/1500mA, AC 100V-240V
packagecontents: 1 x AC Adapter 1 x User manual 1 x Bracket 1 x Remote control 1 x USB cable
mainfeatures: 7 Inch digital photo frame High resolution and adjustable contrast ratio Support images and slides playback with background music, video Variable speed for slide show and automatic slideshow Support Time, alarm, auto turn on/off and calendar functions Key press operation and remote control
